channel.title: MY multiple question thread (was asking about one thing) LOL
channel.description: on project_czar how in the world do you make someone a member or how do you make the member zone free?! someone help please :( i just lost one member because of it :( or how do i add more things to the members only list so they will be worth to "buy" if that is legal

item.title: MY multiple question thread (was asking about one thing) LOL
item.dc:creator: @playgames3 playgames3
item.description:
@playgames3 wrote:

sendQuest(“Info”, 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“A**** Info”, 8145);
sendQuest("----", 8147);
sendQuest(“1. No Teaming/Pjing in EdgeVill!”, 8148);
sendQuest(“2. No Pretending to be Venomizer! punishment - ip ban”, 8149);
sendQuest(“3. Keep the swearing low”, 8150);
sendQuest(“4. No autoing!”, 8151);
sendQuest(“5. Dont ask for admin or mod spot!”, 8152);
sendQuest("@whi@:@gre@:@whi@p@gre@l@whi@a@gre@y@whi@e@gre@r@whi@s@gre@,", 8153);
sendQuest("@whi@:@gre@:@whi@c@gre@h@whi@a@gre@r@whi@,", 8154);
sendQuest("@whi@:@gre@:@whi@y@gre@e@whi@l@gre@l@whi@.", 8155);
sendQuest(“Enjoy the server!”, 8156);
sendQuest(“For forums go to”, 8157);
sendQuest(“http://arielscape.uni.cc”, 8158);
sendQuest(“Please follow and obey the rules!”, 8159);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

*name blanked out so no1 will steal) is what i got you already know what the blanked is! is that right oh great bud

item.title: MY multiple question thread (was asking about one thing) LOL
item.dc:creator: @hellobud hellobud
item.description:
@hellobud wrote:

well actually you would have to find it anyway because you would have to replace code but anyways ill tell you how to find it as clear as i can

1)open up client.java
2)ctrl + F search for sendQuest(“Info”, 8144);
3)it should show something like this

[code]if(playerRights <= 4){

				sendQuest("Info", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("Czarscape INFO", 8145);
				sendQuest("----", 8147);
                			sendQuest("1. No Teaming/Pjing in EdgeVill!", 8148);
				sendQuest("2. No Pretending to be reforced!

punishment - ip ban", 8149);
sendQuest(“3. Keep the swearing low”, 8150);
sendQuest(“4. No autoing!”, 8151);
sendQuest(“5. Dont ask for admin or mod spot!”,

8152);[/code]
4)change the “Czarscape” to your server name and or any of that stuff in between the quotation marks.
5)compile and run server
6)when you log in press ::info and the changes should be included

Read full topic

item.title: MY multiple question thread (was asking about one thing) LOL
item.dc:creator: @hellobud hellobud
item.description:
@hellobud wrote:

im not sure sorry i just started coding not too long ago but if you wanted to make the portal that takes you into members area non members all you would have to do is this
1)go into client.java
2)ctrl + F search for memberportal
3)you find a code saying

//Portals case 7319: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("you teleport to the members area."); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("you have to be a member to use this portal!");
4)then you just change it to this

//Portals case 7319: // memberportal teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("you teleport to the members area.");
and you should be good im about to test one second

Read full topic
